DOC.brief_summary: This 12-month randomized trial design evaluate impact low intensity ( quarterly ) versus high intensity ( monthly ) wellness coach program woman 's success achieve individual health goal relate active living healthy eating change health behavior time .
DOC.brief_title: Coalition Healthier Communityâ€”Utah Women Girls - Phase II ( UWAG-II )
DOC.detailed_description: In Utah , rate obesity elevate among non-White Hispanic woman ( Utah BRFSS Data , 2008-2012 ) . In order address disparity , Coalition Healthier Community Utah Women Girls ( UWAG ) form test effectiveness intervention improve health behavior deliver community wellness coach . UWAG strong partnership academic public health professional Community Faces Utah ( CFU ) , coalition represent five underserved community ( African , African American , American Indian , Hispanic , Pacific Islander ) . The investigator hypothesize wellness coach program use evidence-based lifestyle intervention tailor meet gender cultural need woman five diverse , often underserved community , significantly effective promote sustain behavioral change less intensive wellness coach program . The primary outcome consist either increase number fruit vegetable consume average week and/or number minute spend moderate vigorous physical activity average week , depend participant 's target goal , 12 month enrol study . The investigator view proxy measure obesity prevention reduction , also collect data track change weight , BMI waist-to hip ratio throughout study . Wellness coach lay community member recruit CFU community . They receive extensive training support UWAG team . After informed consent completion baseline study activity , study participant randomize intervention ( high intensity ) comparison ( low intensity ) group . Participants group receive evidenced-based program , A New Leaf , tailor address socio-cultural gender issue deliver community wellness coach community . Participants high-intensity intervention group participate monthly group activity addition monthly wellness coaching session . Participants low-intensity comparison group participate health coach every 4 month . All participant establish goal fruit vegetable consumption , physical activity , . Investigators collect survey clinical data baseline , 4 , 8 , 12 month enrol year participant complete intervention . A return investment analysis conduct . The investigator hypothesize intensive program lead well outcome , ass whether difference degree outcomes warrant additional cost resource . Survey data collect include information demographic , health behavior , goal progress towards achieve goal , mental health , self-efficacy , socio-cultural/gender roles/behaviors related obesity . Clinical data ( blood pressure , body mass index , waist-to hip ratio ) also collect .
